member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Trace.TraceUtils.GetSqlToolsBinaryPath(System.String)
member.summary: Helper function to get full path to the tools (DTA and Profiler, essentially) installation location. This is implemented by querying the registry key that SSMS writed during setup.
member.param: Optional relative path to append (must be prefixed with \); if null/empty, nothing is appended
member.returns: The path to the tools; if something goes wrong, empty

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Trace.TraceReader.GetFieldType(System.Int32)
member.summary: IDataRecord::GetFieldType - Gets the Type information corresponding to the type of Object that would be returned from GetValue This information can be used to increase performance by indicating the strongly-typed accessor to call. (e.g. using GetInt32 is roughly ten times faster than using GetValue.)

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Trace.TraceReader.GetValue(System.Int32)
member.summary: IDataRecord::GetValue - Return the value of the specified field.

member.summary: IDataReader::Depth - Gets a value indicating the depth of nesting for the current row.
